languages.text: "Уже вернулись на ваш корабль, Ваш высокобродие". {n}Малгар старается говорить почтительно, но голос его звенит, словно туго натянутая струна.{/n} "Хорошие ребята, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли нам{/d}. Не то что эта падаль!" {n}Сержант вновь обращает взор на дворян.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Уже вернулись на ваш корабль, Ваш высокобродь". {n}Обернувшийся к вам Малгар старается отвечать почтительно, но в его голосе вы слышите напряжение. Он словно туго натянутая струна, которая вот-вот лопнет.{/n}

languages.text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Уже вернулись на ваш корабль, Ваш высокобродие". {n}Малгар старается говорить почтительно, но голос его звенит, словно туго натянутая струна.{/n} "Хорошие ребята, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}помогли нам{/d}. Не то что эта падаль!" {n}Сержант вновь обращает взор на дворян.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they helped us out. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

"They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

languages.text: "Sie sind bereits wieder auf Eurem Schiff, {mf|Sir|Madam}." {n}Malgar versucht, respektvoll zu klingen, doch seine Stimme vibriert wie eine gespannte Saite.{/n} "Gute Leute, Eure Soldaten, sie {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}haben uns geholfen{/d}. Im Gegensatz zu diesen Aasgeiern!" {n}Er blickt zurück zu den Adligen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sie sind bereits wieder auf Eurem Schiff, {mf|Sir|Madam}." {n}Malgar versucht, respektvoll zu klingen, doch seine Stimme vibriert wie eine gespannte Saite.{/n} "Gute Leute, Eure Soldaten, sie haben uns geholfen. Im Gegensatz zu diesen Aasgeiern!" {n}Er blickt zurück zu den Adligen.{/n}

languages.text: « Ils sont déjà repartis sur votre vaisseau, {mf|monsieur|madame}. »{n}Malgar tente de vous répondre respectueusement, mais la tension dans sa voix est indéniable.{/n} « Vos soldats sont des gars biens ! Ils nous ont {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}filé un sacré coup de main{/d}... contrairement à ces charognes, là ! » {n}Il lance un regard vers les nobles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ils sont déjà repartis sur votre vaisseau, {mf|monsieur|madame}. »{n}Malgar tente de vous répondre respectueusement, mais la tension dans sa voix est indéniable.{/n} « Vos soldats sont des gars biens ! Ils nous ont filé un sacré coup de main... contrairement à ces charognes, là ! » {n}Il lance un regard vers les nobles.{/n}

languages.text: “他们已经回到您的船上了，长官。”{n}马尔加尽可能保持着礼貌的态度，但他的声音就像绷紧的绳子一样震动。{/n}“您的士兵都是好人，他们{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}帮了我们一把{/d}，不像这堆烂肉！”{n}他回过头，怒视着那些贵族。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “他们已经回到您的船上了，长官。”{n}马尔加尽可能保持着礼貌的态度，但他的声音就像绷紧的绳子一样震动。{/n}“您的士兵都是好人，他们帮了我们一把，不像这堆烂肉！”{n}他回过头，怒视着那些贵族。{/n}

languages.text: 「彼らはもう貴船に戻りましたよ、陛下」{n}マルガーは丁重に話そうとしているが、その声は張りつめた糸のように震えている。{/n}「よい方々です、あなた様の兵士らは{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}私達を助けてくれた{/d}。この汚物とは違う！」{n}彼は貴族たちに目をやる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「彼らはもう貴船に戻りましたよ、閣下」{n}マルガーは丁重に話そうとしているが、その声は張りつめた糸のように震えている。{/n}「よい方々だ、あなたの兵士らは私達を助けてくれた。この汚物とは違う！」{n}彼は貴族たちに目をやる。{/n}

languages.text: «Ya han vuelto a su nave, mi{mf|lord|lady}».{n}Malgar intenta sonar respetuoso, pero su voz vibra como una cuerda tensa.{/n} «Buena gente, sus soldados, nos {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}ayudaron{/d}. ¡No como esta carroña!». {n}Mira hacia los nobles.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya han vuelto a su nave, mi{mf|lord|lady}». {n}Malgar intenta sonar respetuoso, pero su voz vibra como una cuerda tensa.{/n} «Buena gente, sus soldados, nos ayudaron. ¡No como esta carroña!». {n}Mira hacia los nobles.{/n}

languages.text: "Çoktan geminize döndüler efendim." {n}Malgar saygılı davranmaya çalışsa da sesi gergin bir tel gibi titriyor.{/n} "Askerleriniz iyi insanlar, {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}bize yardım ettiler{/d}. Şu leş herifler gibi değiller yani!" {n}Soylulara bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "They already went back to your ship, {mf|sir|ma'am}." {n}Malgar is trying to sound respectful, but his voice is vibrating like a taut string.{/n} "Good people, your soldiers, they {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_SergeantGrateful}helped us out{/d}. Unlike this carrion!" {n}He looks back at the nobles.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çoktan geminize geri döndüler efendim." {n}Malgar saygılı görünmeye çalışıyor ama sesi gergin bir tel gibi titriyor.{/n} "Askerleriniz iyi insanlar, bize yardım ettiler. Ama şu hayvanlar!.." {n}Soylulara bakıyor.{/n}
